'''Sojourner's Sweet Dream (Wangshu Night)''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 46]].
